content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)
-  Electricity group (position x=114.5 y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment without fuel
-  Ensure that the burner equipment has fuel before using it
### Errors when using equipment without ingredients
-  Ensure that the equipment has the necessary ingredients before using it
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
-  Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power source before using it
### Errors when using electricity group without plugging into electric network
-  Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into an electric network before using it
### Errors when using pipe group without fluid
-  Ensure that the pipe group has fluid before using it
### Errors when using belt group without items
-  Ensure that the belt group has items before using it

### NAMESPACE
*Important variables:*
- `burner-mining-drill`: Entity
- `stone-furnace`: Entity
- `burner-inserter`: Entity
- `offshore-pump`: Entity
- `boiler`: Entity
- `steam-engine`: Entity
- `pipe-group`: Entity
- `electricity-group`: Entity
- `belt-group`: Entity
- `transport-belt`: Entity

*Utility functions:*
- `create_burner_mining_drill()`: Creates a burner mining drill entity
- `create_stone_furnace()`: Creates a stone furnace entity
- `create_burner_inserter()`: Creates a burner inserter entity
- `create_offshore_pump()`: Creates an offshore pump entity
- `create_boiler()`: Creates a boiler entity
- `create_steam_engine()`: Creates a steam engine entity
- `create_pipe_group()`: Creates a pipe group entity
- `create_electricity_group()`: Creates an electricity group entity
- `create_belt_group()`: Creates a belt group entity
- `create_transport_belt()`: Creates a transport belt entity

Note: The utility functions are assumed based on the entities created in the execution logs. The actual implementation of these functions is not provided in the logs.
